scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('public','build','.vite','manifest.json');const dest=path.join('public','build','manifest.json');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('Manifest copied successfully');}else{console.log('Source manifest not found');}"
scripts.start: npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
scripts.railway:deploy: npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
scripts.dev:enhanced: npm run tailwind:watch & npm run dev
